# Contributing

You consider contributing changes to ngx-uploadx â€“ thank you!

Fork, then clone the repository:

    git clone git@github.com:your-username/ngx-uploadx.git

Install dependencies:

    npm install

Make your changes. Add tests for your changes.

ðŸ‘‰ Please follow our [commit message conventions][commit] even if you're making a small change!

ðŸ‘‰ Please follow [the existing styles][style]!

Push to your fork and [submit a pull request][pr].

[commit]: https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/
